content: after 11 years of legal proceedings the court of appeals in campobasso issued a final resolution in a court case involving mama and mivi the judgment partially reformed the appealed judgment and assigned specific properties to the parties one party was ordered to pay a sum of money to the other party and a rural building was ordered to be demolished the court also allocated the costs of the case and ordered the transcription of the judgment the legal principle applied was article 729 of the civil code the case involved a dispute over the division of inheritance and the release of property the court approved a division project and reduced testamentary dispositions the judgment was appealed and a crossappeal was filed the court considered the arguments and made a decision based on applicable laws and previous court rulings the court addressed the issue of an unauthorized building and excluded it from the division the parties reached a settlement agreement regarding the division of property an expert was appointed by the court to reshape the division plan the court determined the costs of demolition and allocated them to the parties according to their shares certain claims were rejected and the court fully compensated the costs of the case the court of appeals in campobasso made a final ruling on the appeal case confirming the ruling of the first instance the judgment was decided on june 7 2023 and filed in the court registry on october 9 2023 the distribution of costs is 5882353 percent for mama and 411764 percent for mivi the judgment also mentions the details of the building in question and the previous judgment
